name: Raúl Fernández Tirado
about: Graduated in Computer Engineering from the University of Jaén, I currently work as a web developer with PHP, especially using Laravel. Knowledge of Python and web development with Django.

experience.title: ITGallery SLU
experience.subtitle: Full Stack Developer (Remote)
experience.description: Experience in developing and maintaining web projects in PHP, creating APIs with Laravel, customizing templates in Shopify using Liquid and developing Python scripts. Outstanding integration of multiple third-party APIs. Professional use of Bitbucket and Docker for remote work, collaboration in agile teams under SCRUM methodology and project management with Jira

experience.title: Inforalia SL
experience.subtitle: PHP Developer
experience.description: Experience as a PHP backend developer, with significant inroads into frontend development working as a team. Use of an internal framework for the backend, operating under the agile SCRUM methodology to offer integrated and collaborative solutions. Contribution to the team in the effective integration of third-party APIs to enhance functionalities in our applications, strengthening their efficiency and versatility.

experience.title: Riosa
experience.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Development of web applications in PHP for company management, maintenance of Linux servers and office systems. Focus on operational efficiency and innovative systems integration.

experience.title: Castroluz SL
experience.subtitle: Computer Engineering Intern
experience.description: Participation in the ICARO Scholarship focused on the development of legacy web applications using PHP, Bootstrap, jQuery. Management of online sales portals with Oxatis. Direct experience creating and maintaining dynamic web solutions.
